message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you the chance to purchase this product. I believe it would be highly valuable to you. I'm asking for $18,000.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I'm only able to pay up to $15,000 for it.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $18,000 is closer to my bottom line. Could you meet me halfway at $16,500?
Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I'm unable to meet at $16,500. My maximum budget is $15,000. Let's see if we can find common ground.
